title: West Potomac Wolverines fall 35-0 to the Westfield Bulldogs on senior night
body: The high school football week two started before the brightness of the Friday night lights. Westfield hosted West Potomac for senior night on Thursday. It was a one-sided game, with the Bulldogs not waiting to get started. Westfield was up 28-0 at the half.A strong showing for Mikal Legal, who scored 2 touchdowns. Alex Richards also added points to Westfield's runaway victory.The Bulldogs clinched an easy win, 35-0, and are now 1-1 this season.
